normalized: one week passed, since i had planted the bug inside cara.
it was after-school.
today was to be her last day.
i had decided to carry out the plan of getting rid of kamimura the hunter outside the school, immediately after it had been set up.
she had been informed by kitae that the missing student had been seen outside the school's premises.
the student was being accompanied by someone, however, it was unclear whether that person was a vampire or not.
the rest was the domain of kamimura the hunter.
she had acted on that information, as she had always felt like the student had been abducted, before being taken out.
it wasn't false information in itself, however, i had used the abducted student as bait, in order to lure azuma out.
and then, she was to be gotten rid off.
the hunter, who was completely oblivious to all of this, had taken it upon herself and gone out, armed with her fighting spirit.
and so, the nosy woman was out of my way.
all that was left to do was make cara fall and transform her into my puppet.

name: cara
normalized: fufu… you are here, just as i had expected.
the queen came to the classroom, before raising the edges of her luscious lips.
kukuku… did you come here especially for me?

name: yamakawa
normalized: indeed, i am.
i have some business with you as well, professor cara.

name: cara
normalized: oh… is that so?

name: yamakawa
normalized: yes.
it is extremely important as well.

name: gram
normalized: … eh?
numerous holes opened up all over my body, the moment i was about to activate the bug.

name: gram
normalized: ugaah!?
my blood started overflowing out of those holes.
but how…?

name: gram
normalized: w-why…!?

name: azuma
normalized: it's just as you said, miss queen.
the woman standing beside her, while holding a bat which was glowing with a pale light, was the teacher, who i was certain had gone out.

name: gram
normalized: you bastard!?
why… are you here…!?

name: azuma
normalized: i merely pretended to leave, as the director was practically forcing me out, before returning back, in order to defend miss queen, just as she had told me to.

name: gram
normalized: cara told you to…?
damn it…!

name: cara
normalized: did you really think that i was merely wandering around the school aimlessly?

name: gram
normalized: kuh…!?
the queen's red eyes were shining ominously, and yet, her glare was icy-cold as well, enough to freeze me completely.
i was completely frozen and the freedom of my movements was stolen away, as she set her eyes on her prey.
it was almost as if she had pierced me with her glare, which was teeming with a vampire's hunting instinct.

name: cara
normalized: i came across an amrita junkie, while wandering around the school building.
the janitor… had messed up.

name: cara
normalized: that man told me everything, after i threatened him.
i immediately dispelled that strange curse of yours, before killing your soldiers.

name: gram
normalized: what… the hell…?
i was under the assumption that my plan was working perfectly, however, it had already collapsed.

name: cara
normalized: you are an eyesore.
get out of my sight.

name: cara
normalized: tear him to pieces, my minions.

name: gram
normalized: ugooh…!?
she sliced my body in two with the tips of her bat-like wings.

name: marika
normalized: master…!?
the knight stared at my severed body in astonishment, while standing at the entrance of the classroom.

name: gram
normalized: kuuh…!
i was scattered all over the classroom's floor,
which included my flesh and even my blood…
it reached all the way up to marika's feet.

name: azuma
normalized: you aren't resurrecting yourself again!
uryaa!
my field of vision went pitch black, as a silvery-blue streak fell down on me.
my head had been crushed.
she engulfed my body in a flame, which was used in exorcisms, in order to be thorough in my disposal.

name: marika
normalized: uguh!?
her trembling body leapt up with a start.

name: cara
normalized: marika, how are you?
are you back to your original self, now that the master of the bug has been disposed off?

name: marika
normalized: ugh… yes, miss cara…

name: azuma
normalized: is it over?

name: cara
normalized: looks like it.

name: azuma
normalized: however, this vampire was quite a stubborn one.
azuma took a cigarette out and put it in her mouth, while looking down at the cinders of my remains.
i raised the edges of my lips, while looking at her.

name: marika
normalized: … fufu… she truly is… an eyesore…
i mumbled it so softly that no one could hear me.
not a single drop of the blood, which should have been at the knight's feet, was visible now.
